column1: # Since moving to image recognition instead of text recognition for recognising which character is being played (as to make the recognition more reliable and language-indipendent), I need a screenshot for all the characters in order to tell the program what to look for for each character.

# As I don't have some of the DLC characters, some reference closeups are missing, which means those characters are not supported. The characters not supported are commented out of this list with an '#'. The '#' is not a .tsv convention for comments line but I chose it to be this way.

# If you wish for an unsupported character to be supported, you can send me a screenshots of the the second result screen (the one with the "Out at" time) with the character you want to add, both of matches with 3 and 4 players (CPU is ok) and possibly where the wanted character doesn't win, and I'll do the rest. More info in the README.
